cards.title: Fixed
points: Fixed Git auto-sync issue by adding default values for missing keys
Fixed an issue where controls were not published or saved correctly in Control Designer
Fixed OpenAI module versioning issue to ensure proper dependency management
Fixed an issue where secured login URLs incorrectly redirected to the login screen
Fixed an issue with manual hard resets to ensure proper branch state restoration

cards.title: Added
points: Added search and pagination options in DronaHQ file storage.

cards.title: Fixed
points: Fixed an issue where during rollback, rules were received as double-stringified in the rollback API call, causing the rollback to fail.

cards.title: Added
points: Added automation_scheduled_list collection to the configuration file for centralized scheduler management.

cards.title: Enhancements
points: Enhanced default formula handling to support additional data type scenarios for the selected flag.

cards.title: Fixed
points: Fixed an issue where Data Query with manual pagination was not functioning as expected.
Fixed an issue where multiple instances or pods triggered the automation scheduler multiple times.
Fixed an issue where Drona's default loader briefly appeared before the custom loader defined in the theme.
Fixed an issue where the screen action flow was not handled properly when empty.
Fixed an issue where JSOBJECTS local variables were not re-attached on refresh.
Fixed an issue where the Dropdown default value was not displaying after navigation.
Fixed an issue where mismatched data types prevented correct control property binding.
Fixed an issue where the Failure Condition message was not sent in the execute query API response.

cards.title: Fixed
points: Fixed an issue in PDF Creator internal URL handling to support local callbacks correctly.
Fixed an issue in the in-app import/export JSON formatter for improved consistency and reliability.

cards.title: Fixed
points: Fixed an issue where Advance editor panel plus button was not opening control listing on builder view.
Fixed an issue where the URLs for user and license validation in execute Query were not resolving correctly.

cards.title: Fixed
points: Fixed an issue where during rollback, rules were received as double-stringified in the rollback API call, causing the rollback to fail.

cards.title: Fixed
points: Fixed an issue where the automation scheduler was triggered multiple times by multiple instances.

cards.title: Fixed
points: Fixed an issue where the old connector sidebar failed to open due to a conditional error.

cards.title: Added
points: Added the x-dronahq-request-id header in REST connector requests to improve traceability.

cards.title: Fixed
points: Fixed an issue with JWT encoding in Secure Embed, ensuring proper token generation and validation.

cards.title: Added
points: Added External logger and Task metering to execute query endpoint.

cards.title: Enhancements
points: Improved Redis connector by adding expire time field in set action.

cards.title: Fixed
points: Fixed an issue where user was unable to filter from service tag in Datadog logger.
Fixed an issue in Secure embed license counter.
Fixed an issue with type handling for controlMeta in convertToJSON function.

cards.title: Added
points: Added EC2 IAM Role and ARN support to AWS Athena connector.
Added environment variable support for AUTOMATION_LOGGING_CHARACTER_LIMIT.
Added feature for folder name as prefix filter in Azure Storage getFiles.
Added audit logging for key Git operations.
Added support for suggesting nested keys in JS Editor and String Builder.
Added functions to detect and apply themes and custom fonts on JSON Schema form control.
Added improvements for Bind data, docking fixes, folder-name, Canvas fixes.
Added support for IAM Role-based access for GCP Storage.
Added support for AWS S3-compatible storage for file storage.
Added moment-timezone library.
Added new buttons for 'Publish' and 'Publish with Git'.
Added support for configurable deprecation messages in Actionflow blocks.

cards.title: Enhancements
points: Enhanced security by removing sensitive info from REST API and GraphQL connector network calls.
Improved documentation URL for run logs and custom task logs.
Enhanced Automation variables for better usability.
Improved Snowflake connector with additional functionality.
Enhanced environment security: default secret keys removed and now auto-generated on restart.
Enhanced DronaHQ cloud features synced with self-hosted deployment.
Enhanced ability to access environment variables within connectors.
Enhanced error handling in Snowflake when wrong passphrase is provided with private key.
Enabled schema support for Databricks connector.
Enhanced dynamic query JS formatting on save.
Enhanced screen sidebar: scroll position is now maintained when selecting screens.
Enhanced whitelisted domain support for buckets URL to support nonce exceptions.
Enhanced logging by removing unwanted automation JSON from console output.
Enhanced support for environment variables in oauth_v2 type, multistep auth, and other related areas.

cards.title: Fixed
points: Fixed an issue in IndexedDB where object parsing was failing.
Fixed an issue in managed-database: converting any data type to auto-incrementing failed.
Fixed an issue in managed-database: auto-incrementing type not converting to regular numeric data types.
Fixed an issue in managed-database: timestamp with timezone caused errors on record creation with local/UTC timestamps.
Fixed an issue in managed-database: view record highlighting wrong table row when foreign key updated.
Fixed an issue in managed-database: invalid data insertion failed without highlighting faulty column in UI.
Fixed an issue in managed-database: numeric field not storing decimal values.
Fixed routing URL on home screen reset showing incorrect screen.
Fixed control names retaining whitespace unnecessarily.
Fixed MSSQL prepared statement flow for Node 22.
Fixed localization issues in DateTime, Date, and Time controls.
Fixed request spoofing issue related to code digits.
Fixed webhook test issue where request was not received.
Fixed custom filename handling in Azure Storage uploadFile.
Fixed inconsistent behavior in kvstore actions within web view.
Fixed direct CDN link references used in project.
Fixed UI issue in File Storage grid view for long filenames.
Fixed File Storage selection panel not opening.
Fixed issue in import actionflow dropdown: unique screen names not visible.
Fixed multiselect dropdown not reflecting changes in properties panel immediately.
Fixed vulnerability in snowflake-sdk module.
Fixed connector sidebar search not returning results with capital letters.
Fixed scroll issues in PDF list, app list, and connector list.
Fixed unwanted scroll in column names list within the right properties panel.
Fixed mapped formula box displaying unindented JSON.
Fixed double-stringified data in JSON viewer.
Fixed app import not working as expected.
Fixed UI misalignment in SQL form connector sidebar.
Fixed issue in PDF Creator: adding long text variable hides Add/Delete buttons.
Fixed issue in PDF Creator: Delete key does not remove selected variable.
Fixed issue in PDF Creator: expanding 'Release Notes' field breaks UI.
Fixed issue in PDF Creator: font mismatch in delete popup between Dev and Cloud.
Fixed issue in PDF Creator: incorrect 'Created' date/month display.
Fixed issue in PDF Creator: last two PDFs' three-dot dropdown not fully visible.
Fixed rule evaluation bug in micro-app navigation with query-string references.
Fixed dropdown issue in Google Sheets connector.
Fixed multistep encryption not working in Public URL (Public Access).
Fixed automation connector query duplication during import.
Fixed full automation name not visible in UI.
Fixed connector logs displaying incorrect data after user switch in preview.
Fixed auto-width issue in container control caused by auto-generated form.
Fixed illegal characters being added during variable renaming.
Fixed JSON serialization issue in MySQL JDBC connector.
Fixed improper error returned by execute query endpoint.
Fixed UI cursor pointer in table grid column format dropdown.
Fixed DQ listing showing 'No data found' with updated text.
Fixed parsing issue in prepared statement queries.
Fixed share button not opening sidebar.
Fixed switching to table view removing response data.
Fixed execution stop failure in DQ preview and package modes.
Fixed publish functionality not working as expected.
Fixed health status file repository throwing invalid file name error.
Fixed offset key dropdown not displaying in DQ pagination.
Fixed INSERT, UPDATE, DELETE query execution in connector test.
Fixed logout delay in public apps with verified users.
Fixed broken UI in user activation flow.
Fixed reset password error when clicking 'Get Reset Link'.
Fixed DQ filter popup getting cut off.
Fixed Multistep SSO issue in secure embed.
Fixed default access issues for PDF Creator and Connector in Automation and Builder.
Fixed issue in Google OAuth SSO.
Fixed offline submission value not passed to function.
Fixed blank screen when double-clicking menu item to navigate.
Fixed toast message box alignment for HHD screens.
Fixed list-type control headers not being created.
Fixed default text UI bug in RichText Editor.
Fixed padding in advanced settings icon for Inside property.
Fixed color picker box click issue.
Fixed dropdown closing in Microapp Nav config on clicking search.
Fixed false value handling in custom parameters in Trigger Data Query.
Fixed validation errors persisting in Manage Group sidebar.
Fixed mismatch between selected preview user and useremail keyword.
Fixed screen shift on tray screen open.
Fixed tray screen footer misalignment when keyboard visible.
Fixed error handling typo.
Fixed unwanted scroll in publish sidebar.
Fixed infinite loading state in Git-protected apps.
Fixed publish dropdown options not appearing correctly.
Fixed filtered Data issue in global variables.

cards.title: Enhancements
points: Enhanced the Asset Manager with support for cloud services.

cards.title: Fixed
points: Fixed file repository fallback issues by adding a reverse proxy for cloud storage.
Fixed JavaScript module import issue on builder - which was clashing with existing module

cards.title: Fixed
points: Fixed an issue where the Form Repeat Control was not working as expected in the package.
Fixed a dropdown issue in the Google Sheets connector.
Fixed environment variable validation for managed audit logs.
Fixed a bug where Rules were not working when referencing a query string set via micro-app navigation.
Fixed an issue where App name was not getting passed in published api call.
Fixed an issue with secure embed where it was stuck in an infinite loading state.

cards.title: Added
points: Added Screen ID option to change under Screen Properties.
Added IGNORE_CALLBACK_MESSAGE variable to ignore error_message from OAuth callback.
Added a new connector for Databricks.

cards.title: Enhancements
points: Enhanced with a new column type as HTML View. New options for editable output in Date Time and Date Time column types.
Enhanced with function parameters suggestion in CodeMirror.
Enhanced Custom Library Import with conflict detection and recovery module.
Enhanced Automation listing by adding via iframe.
Enhanced the Protected Apps option for Apps added into Git, enabling app editing only through the feature branch for improved collaboration.
Enhanced Git Sync health check for write permission check.
Enhanced Snowflake SDK version upgraded from 1.6.3 to 2.0.1.
Enhanced fast-xml-parser version upgraded from 3.21.1 to 4.2.7.
Enhanced GitSync feature with added logger.
Enhanced addAndCommit method performance and created new function addRemoveGenerateCommitMessageAndCommit.
Enhanced the Redis connector by adding an 'Expire' action.
Enhanced the Git-protected app builder by displaying the current working branch name.
Enhanced query functionality by adding a method to fetch Glue tables.
Improved SSH key management by adding passphrase support when importing a private key.
Improved DataQuery security by sanitizing HTML responses for table views.
Removed the Terms & Conditions checkbox button from the End User Portal login.
Improved DataQuery UI by ensuring saved queries display a green dot in GraphQL.
Enhanced error handling in multistep SSO by retrying nonce fetching if missing and refining minor error handling.
Enhanced exception handling of Aggregate errors for MySQL and MariaDB.
Enhanced the process of generating Git commit messages for better clarity and efficiency.
Enhanced the encryption of dynamic_variables when saving a connector's account API for improved security.

Enhanced the REST API connector by allowing no_auth, api_key, basic_auth, aws_auth, digest_auth, and hawk_auth methods to be saved directly without testing from the 'Manage Environments' section in the edit/create sidebar.

cards.title: Fixed
points: Fixed issue in DataQuery where the edited state (green dot) was visible by default on opening a connector query in RestAPI.
Fixed logging and error issues.
Fixed issue where custom fonts were not working in theme configuration.
Fixed issue where the last metric control inside the grid panel appeared slightly larger than others.
Fixed a bug in the Connector Library rendering dot-separated dynamic variable values in DataQuery.
Fixed an issue with the AWS RDS status code.
Fixed an issue where toggle-type column images appeared to flash when the control was refreshed.
Fixed an issue where the PDF modal was sticking to the top instead of appearing at the center.
Fixed an issue where adding a connector failed for self-hosted setups configured over HTTP.
Fixed the issue with the edit app details for git apps which were not working.
Fixed the issue preventing API calls related to the share sidebar from occurring.
Fixed the issue causing the home screen of the app to appear during routing.
Fixed the problem where the app did not function as expected after publishing.
Fixed the old server-side Actionflow connector sidebar rendering bug.
Fixed the issue where dynamic credentials were not passing the values of controls or variables.
Fixed the conflict where the delete control shortcut interfered with the normal Cmd+Del behavior.
Fixed bug in Git Sync branch creation and minor CSS fix for update loader UI, app publish issue from Git Sync sidebar.
Fixed issue where old app JSON file persists in Git causing old app to get synced when pulled from Git.
Fixed Git-protected app not working as per permission.
Fixed bug where last release JSON was given priority over new JSON.
Fixed DataQuery editable state green dot bug.
Fixed bug for DataQuery datatypes and homepage selection.
Fixed custom file name passed to Google Cloud Storage connector in case of multiple files causing issue in file extension.
Fixed the issue where branches of Git-protected apps inside folders wouldn't load.
Fixed reload icon in File Storage (was looking like undo).
Fixed bug related to header update on folders rename, delete, and other operations.
Fixed editable green dot visible for connector query only for DataQueries.
Fixed filtered out Redis and JDBC from Autogen.
Fixed connector response for table view.
Fixed field value retention issue when editing OIDC SSO config and adding new one.
Fixed duplicate click event function causing app setting dropdown toggle issue.
Fixed an issue where dynamic creds were rendering even when dynamic creds toggle was off.
Fixed Audit logger error handling and sidebar access.
Fixed rules condition name change.
Fixed DataQuery: Connector library/query on direct save suggestion not creating bug.
Fixed credential vulnerabilities in connector.scheme.modal.js.
Fixed an issue where RMID cookie was not generated after activating the license.
Fixed an issue where multistep auth connector errors in data queries and account decryption failures were not properly handled.
Fixed an issue where icon and image URLs caused errors in the console.
Fixed session logout issue on automation iframe reload to reload the entire page.
Fixed sorting and persistence issues in StudioConsole.
Fixed a bug where custom JavaScript could not be added from quick select.
Fixed missing PDF Modal opening transition.
Fixed a bug where permission sidebars in 'Manage Users' did not show apps inside folders.
Fixed version preview scrolling issue. For Scheduler, added a tooltip popup for save actions and an icon in the trigger label. Also, added sanitizeHtmlCharacters function for preselect dropdowns.
Fixed automation import, export, and GitSync sidebar UI issues.
Fixed minor UI issues in Git sync (button color and confirmation message).
Fixed DataQuery table response post-save.
Fixed an issue where active tabs were not being updated properly in case of no sorting preference.
Fixed user list filter icon and process.
Fixed incorrect positioning of tooltip in CodeMirror instances in some cases.
Fixed an issue where apps added to favourites were not appearing in the Favourites tab after removing sorting.
Fixed: Saved connector query rendering null raw response value showing error message toast.
Fixed PDF Template Creation Sidebar Header Missing.
Fixed Health Status UI Issue by Adding a Non-Configured State.
Fixed 'Sign in with Google' button removal on end user portal login.
Fixed an issue where removing an app from Git took a long time and failed.
Fixed an issue where editing app details inside a folder was logging an error and preventing changes from being saved.
Fixed an issue where creating a folder while in the 'Folder' tab caused only folders to render in the 'App' tab.
Fixed a vulnerability by removing the Redshift module from runAPI.
Fixed an issue where the header was not updating to display tabs after modifying app details for an app inside a folder.
Fixed an issue by hiding the Reset Password field.
Fixed AWS authentication not working on self-hosted instances.
Fixed an issue where the 'lastRelease' folder and dynamic variables were not removed from the subcat schema.
Fixed a security issue by rectifying the connector API details for export JSON.
Fixed an issue where subcat's response and failure headers were not muted.
Fixed a bug that caused Salesforce account addition to fail.
Fixed an issue where RMID expiration was not extending properly by utilizing the session cookie.
Fixed and enhanced error handling for multistep SSO to improve stability.
Fixed an issue where the default Drona icon was displayed for all apps in view mode instead of their respective icons.
Fixed missing HTTP/HTTPS in the endpoint URL, which was causing the UI to become stuck.
Fixed AWS Auth REST API mandatory field issue.
Fixed inability to import apps containing PDF Creator and File Storage Queries.
Fixed an empty connector screen that was displaying upon search.
Fixed UI issues on the 'Forgot Password' screen while logging in.
Fixed the docs icon for control documentation.
Fixed controls overlapping in the 'Add New Screen' popup.
Fixed the issue where the foreign key dropdown excluded the current table when creating a new table.

cards.title: Enhancements
points: Enhanced HashiCorp unwrapped secret ID location.
Improved error handling in multistep SSO by retrying nonce fetching if missing and refining minor error handling.
Enhanced multistep SSO error handling.

cards.title: Fixed
points: Fixed a bug in the template for the old connector binding sidebar.
Fixed RMID expiration by extending it through session cookies.

cards.title: Fixed
points: Fixed credential vulnerabilities in connector.scheme.modal.js.
Fixed generic checks for multistepAuthenticationScreen function calls.

cards.title: Enhancements
points: Enhanced Screen ID configuration, allowing changes under Screen Properties.

cards.title: Fixed
points: Fixed issue where Tablegrid squishes if the data is fetched while the screen is not active.
Fixed an issue where the home screen of the app is visible while routing.
Fixed issue by removing dynamic_variables key from test_db_sub_cat call.
Fixed custom file name passed to Google Cloud Storage connector in case of multiple files causing issues in file extension.
Fixed internet error when creating a user group.

cards.title: Fixed
points: Fixed an issue where the home screen of the app is visible while routing.
Fixed issue by adding 'from email' field in SMTP connector configuration.

cards.title: Enhancements
points: Enhanced Git Sync health check for write permission check.

cards.title: Enhancements
points: Enhanced encryption with RMID cookie and added two variables in config file: session_timeout_ms, session_refresh_time_frame.
Enhanced GitLab authentication support for Git Sync.

cards.title: Fixed
points: Fixed connection to Snowflake failing due to library version.
Fixed issue where adding a connector fails for self-hosted when configured over HTTP.

cards.title: Added
points: Added IGNORE_CALLBACK_MESSAGE variable to ignore error_message from OAuth callback.

cards.title: Enhancements
points: Enhanced session management by excluding a few callback endpoints.
Enhanced DataQuery with a secure response feature.
Enhanced security by removing the RMID cookie and replacing it with globalConfig.session_key_name.
Enhanced public link and CDN checks for potential issues.
Enhanced PDF Creator by adding cache busting support.
Enhanced multer middleware for the updateAppDetails and registerNewAppV3 endpoints.

cards.title: Fixed
points: Fixed an issue where the delete shortcut was not working.
Fixed the logout button issue on the end-user portal.
Fixed an issue by stringifying the API subcategory's body data while editing in the sidebar.

cards.title: Enhancements
points: Enhanced DronaHQ Database APIs with improved security.
Enhanced File Storage APIs for better security.
Enhanced webapp EJS files by adding static file versions.
Enhanced security by changing the secret key name.
Enhanced session IP address validation for Addons.

cards.title: Fixed
points: Fixed an issue where the tabbed container did not maintain space for hidden controls.
Fixed multiple security vulnerabilities with patches.
Fixed UI issues for SSO configuration in the manage users section.
Fixed an issue where the edit option for SSO did not appear during the first configuration.
Fixed a Salesforce refresh token flow issue where queries failed for older connectors.

cards.title: Enhancements
points: Enhanced security by adding encryption for all multistep auth connector API requests.

cards.title: Fixed
points: Fixed a vulnerability by removing private keys.
Fixed incorrect health status on the activation and login pages.
Fixed an issue where the edit details option was not visible to owners.
Fixed a DHQ DB query issue during the import/export of apps.
Fixed container crashes when the password field was empty while connecting to MongoDB.

cards.title: Deprecated
points: Removed the channel ID from API requests.

cards.title: Added
points: Added health check for Git Sync and SMTP.
Added icons in Actions and Controls.
Added cache busting for File Storage.
Added cache busting for DHQ Database.
Added fix for handling forward dependency not getting triggered in case of widget controls.

cards.title: Enhancements
points: Minor enhancement in CSV column naming.

cards.title: Fixed
points: Fixed bug for Git Sync app creation with duplicate names and error message.
Fixed issue where the default message file was not included for console.
Fixed table grid squishing when data is fetched while the screen is not active.
Fixed Multistep connector IDs not updating after importing the app.
Fixed OTA updates for controls and functions in the airgap module.

cards.title: Added
points: Added JWT library for automation.

cards.title: Enhancements
points: Enhanced logic for conditional visibility for the Add-to-Git button.
Updated icons for action flow actions.

cards.title: Fixed
points: Fixed sticky header issue that prevented right-side content from rendering on an attached screen canvas.
Fixed endpoints visible for Managed Storage, AWS S3 in Data Query.
Fixed issue where controls were selectable to move outside of the widget in the canvas when dropped.
Fixed autogen form submission issue that caused stack overflow when submitting blank forms.
Fixed cross-account access to DynamoDB using ARN.
Fixed logging and error issues.
Fixed UI issue in Manage User where role tag was overlapping the user group tag.

cards.title: Added
points: Enhanced Git Sync module authentication - authentication method changed to personal access token (PAT) and UI Enhancements
Added Airgap compatibility for DronaHQ Self-Hosted.

cards.title: Fixes
points: Fixed an issue with import/export app and added support for custom functions.
Fixed an issue in IndexDB for clearing unwanted records.
Fixed issues with Classic headers for supporting controls inside it.
Fixed refresh token flow for salesforce and fixed minor library issues.
Fixed an issue where Multistep auth screen not working as expected in end user portal.
Fixed an issue with File Storage connector where api list was broken in DataQuery.

cards.title: Added
points: Added SSH Key Management.
Added SSH tunneling for databases.

cards.title: Enhancements
points: Enhanced API response in aws-import where getusercredentials was returning 500 code for data not found.
Enhanced error handling in Salesforce connector when dynamic data is missing.
Enhanced IndexDB usage for deleting item from cache when category is deleted.

cards.title: Fixes
points: Fixed issue with Addon sync where tasks were not resetting.

cards.title: Removed
points: Removed 'Hide whitelist IP' option from connector configuration.

cards.title: Added
points: Added ListObjectsAdvanced and SDK handling in AWS S3 connector.

cards.title: Enhancements
points: Default messages created for localization in HTML.

cards.title: Fixes
points: Fixed broken UI in Automation modal.
Fixed issue with app import failing.
Fixed multistep authentication issue in Actionflow where connector returned error but ran success flow instead.
Fixed the assumeRole flow in cases where no security tokens are provided.
Fixed broken image problem in the create dropdown on the App Listing page.
Fixes made for app export not opening in settings.
Fixed SSO cookie domain issue.
Fixed connector account selection for managed services.
Fixed installed global connector sync (id clashing with other service).
Fixed error handling in AWS S3 ReadFile.
Fixed an issue where IDP initiated login was throwing an exception.
Fixed an issue preventing the app export panel from opening correctly.
Fixed an issue regarding activation of File Storage addon.
Fixed an issue where output of selected tab was not bindable on tabbed containers.

cards.title: Added
points: Added icons for localStorage actions.

cards.title: Enhancements
points: Enhanced configuration file with automation webhook listening variables.

cards.title: Fixes
points: Fixed issue with DHQ Database CSV import.
Fixed issue where the presigned URL copy failed due to expiration time exceeding one week (SigV4 limitation).
Fixed Actionflow opening in a minimized window.
Fixed connection issue with Redshift.
Fixed bug causing a 500 error when saving a MongoDB query with variable referencing.
Fixed alert positioning issue behind the tray on bottom-opening trays.
Fixed controls for attached menu and header where drag and resize were disabled.
Fixed broken delete icon on the manage user screen.
Fixed issue with routing variables not displaying values correctly.
Fixed dropdown visibility issue for language selection after uploading a new language.
Fixed missing tab index for Advanced Dropdown.
Fixed bug where the sticky menu was hidden on app launch.

cards.title: Added
points: Added support for key ‘IdPResponse’ in multistep SAML based auth.

cards.title: Added
points: Added support for configurable JSON field size in connector with ‘MAX_FILE_UPLOAS_SIZE_MB’ variable.

cards.title: Added
points: Added support to modify controls' unique name.

cards.title: Fixes
points: Fixed connector response issue after edit in actionflow.
Fixed issues with concurrent access.
Fixed MSSQL prepared statement connector query preparation.
Fixed GitSync bug with connector in action flow (showing deleted in iterate task).
Fixed minor bugs.

cards.title: Added
points: Added fallback icon for app.
Added multi-region support for Data-dog (External Logger).
Added support for control (Tabbed-container).

cards.title: Fixes
points: Fixed bug in Sync-license for decrypting task_reset_date.
Fixed user email logging in widgets creation and updation.
Fixed default service name to dynamic in Datadog configuration.
Fixed focusout issue for dropdown property in settings.
Fixed dependency generation in screen header for formula evaluation.

cards.title: Added
points: Added option to switch between multiple data queries without saving.
Added tabs to let you edit multiple data queries parallelly.
Added support for widget in Autogen.

cards.title: Fixes
points: Fixed extra getauditlog call.
Fixed indentation syntax.
Fixed non-stringified null case handling while replacing dynamic variables in query.
Fixed issue where delete option was not visible inside apps under certain conditions.
Fixed continuous loader issue on saving a Connector Library.
Fixed UI for DataQuery to display the trigger data query code with the correct datatype.

cards.title: Fixes
points: Fixed call_external_logger message, UI, and typos.
Resolved recursive call issue for setting data to header screen controls; addressed an edge case found on PROD.
Minor bug fix for required key in UI section.
Fixed data query preview bug.
Added support for Tabbed container in Autogens and Validation screen for forms.

cards.title: Added
points: IAM Role based access support for AWS Secret Manager
Configure multiple audit logs

cards.title: Added
points: DHQ RPC: Using DronaHQ managed Remote Procedure Call (RPC) connector, you can connect directly to your codebase. Once enabled, you can define functions in your backend and use them within DronaHQ apps and automations.
Prepared statement support for bulk insert in SQLCRUD

cards.title: Enhancements
points: Automation export: New Improved User experience.
Manual push option added for git sync
Restructuring error handling in Mongodb connector
DataQuery - DronaHQ Database : Skip Test and Save Query option for Insert, Update, Delete support.
Data Query user interface improved
Creating headers for all unique keys in array in data binding section
DronaHQ Database : No Primary Key Flow & Timezone support
Default scheme for response and failure in Sub cat api json

cards.title: Fixes
points: Permission sidebar not opening.
Footer not showing in controls properly.
Dataqeury UI was not showing properly on some screen resolutions.
DataQuery: "{{unique_id}}" value show in test variables fixed.
DataQuery: String value replace with "[object Object]" fixed.
Connector list in sidebar not refreshing after adding new connector or subcategory.
Tooltip css margin for controls issue fixed.
MongoDB: dynamic collection dropdown not working fixed.
Property section minor fixes
Connection options value in connector fixed.
Timepicker Control: 24 hour format issue fixed.
DataQuery: Connector Query in MongoDB render issue for Option type field fixed.
Disable edit option for global cat & sub cat inside the app builder
Css fix for control loader for published app.
Tabbed Container related fixes.
DB Connector: prepared statement bug fix for table grid.
DronaHQ Database related fixes.

cards.title: Removed
points: Pagination UI from SQLCRUD Sidebar.

cards.title: Added
points: AWS Secret Manager support added
DronaHQ managed PDF creator introduced
DronaHQ managed Audit logs introduced
Folders introduced for app management
Mark app as favourite while building
static file versioning to prevent update caching
Form auto-generation with CURD operations added

cards.title: Enhancements
points: New experience for app, connectors, users listing
Single login page for Creator and End user
Themes sidebar improvements

cards.title: Added
points: AWS Lambda connector support added
SSO group override option added
Approle Mount and TLS added to Hashicorp Vault
Hashicorp wrapping secret id support added

cards.title: Enhancements
points: User-Agent set as dronahq for internal api calls to third party
Connector health check improved
Caching in IndexDB optimized
XSS vulnerability fixed

cards.title: Added
points: Dynamic credentials fields for NoSQL databases in the data query section.

cards.title: Enhancements
points: Improved error handling for data queries written in custom JavaScript.
Enhanced the behavior of the auto-transform toggle.

cards.title: Fixes
points: Dragging issues with the bottom panel.
Corrected task counter display on the apps screen.
Fixed the logic for resetting task counters.
Converted the “prepareObjectForFmlToSave” function to use promises.
Fixed issues with reloading content parameters and passed the channel ID.

cards.title: Fixes
points: Updated and fixed issues with git synchronization.

cards.title: Added
points: Introduced a new user interface for performing bulk actions.
Added functionality for importing and exporting automations.
Implemented a connector for reading and downloading files from S3.
Updated the color picker to modify format data tag colors.
Included an option to align text within controls in the property section.
Adjusted the height of the data queries popup based on the screen viewport.
Added an auto-transform feature for improved automation.
Included default role settings for SSO.

cards.title: Enhancements
points: Updated the runapi feature.

cards.title: Fixes
points: Resolved issues with traceroute functionality.

cards.title: Added
points: New feature: global git sync

cards.title: Fixes
points: Issues in Rest API proxy

cards.title: Added
points: New feature: request timeout configuration
Feature Keyword-DATAQUERY and Property-META
DataType in multiLine_js editor

cards.title: Enhancements
points: Handled HTML API response
Only check AWS configuration when clicking on automation menu
Separated connector test and save
Changed runapi rest proxy to axios for converting same name query params to array format
Changed inlineJSTokenizer into SBTokenizer

cards.title: Fixes
points: Bugs on builder page view and tutorial
Separated save and test button for connectors

cards.title: Added
points: Themes
Recurring actionflow
Fetch subcat data
x-remote-ip and user-agent header

cards.title: Enhancements
points: Form save optimization
Modified Health status flow
Optimized studio APIs
Changed builder info sequence
Minor code fixes in connector-health-check

cards.title: Fixes
points: Issues in connector health check
Studio themes
Permission bug and form save optimization bug
Reload content and exception handling
ConnectorQry duplicate creating error and test value wrapper UI bug
Multiple table schema support for Postgres (CRUD operation)
Domain branding issues
Onboarding issue
Axios–0.18.x vulnerability

cards.title: Added
points: Enhanced account security with credential encryption.
Improved logging capabilities with external logger support.
Introduced Progressive Web App (PWA) support for seamless browser access.
Integrated VARIABLES with DQL for advanced data querying.
Implemented custom control error handling for enhanced robustness.
Added “Edit Group” option in Manage Group for easier administration.
Added fetch subcat data.
Added x-remote-ip and user-agent header.
Feature: SSL with sslmode for REST API and DB connectors.
Addition of Library for Code Syntax Highlighting (Chat Control).

cards.title: Enhancements
points: Optimized database access strategy for enhanced performance.
Updated the runapi script in index.js for better script management.
Automation phase 2.
API call fix for AWS regions.
DQL prefix “data” removed, Branding Announcement removal, link added for DQL story & dependency handling for preview, package, builder & iteratetask updates.
Creds Cache Fixes, Events changes.
Chat Control Dependency and SB UI Update.
Update: Airtable2 handling + skip_uri_component_encoding key added.
Z-index updated for Ready template sidebar and share public link sidebar.

cards.title: Fixes
points: Resolved formatId bug for accurate data formatting.
Addressed a menu handling bug in the preview mode.
Fixed UI issue in Papertrail for improved user interface.
Fixed issues in connector health check.
Fixed Studio themes.
Fixed permission bug and form save optimization bug.
Fixed reload content and exception handling.
Fixed ConnectorQry duplicate creating error and test value wrapper UI bug.
Fixed multiple table schema support for Postgres (CRUD operation).
Fixed domain branding issues.
Fixed onboarding issue.
Fixed axios–0.18.x vulnerability.
Small bug fix for menu handling in preview.
Table grid refresh fix.
Fixed changes for totp case in runapi.
Bugfixes.

cards.title: Added
points: New feature: request timeout configuration.
Feature Keyword-DATAQUERY and Property-META.
New feature added: Secret Manager integration with HashiCorp Vault.
AI integration implemented within connectors.
SSH tunneling disabled for on-prem DB connectors; SSH keys network call managed in shell scripts.

cards.title: Enhancements
points: VARIABLES: Updated variable references for accuracy.
Permission enhancements implemented.
Handled HTML API response.
Only check AWS configuration when clicking on automation menu.
Separated connector test and save.
Changed runapi rest proxy to axios for converting same name query params to array format.
Changed inlineJSTokenizer into SBTokenizer.

cards.title: Fixes
points: Bug fixes applied to the SB UI Module.
AWS import integration completed.
URL and conditional corrections made.
Connector sub-category names now displayed in connection logs.
Encryption functionality added to connectors.
MariaDB Connector Driver updated.
Response headers fixed in variables dropdown within action flows.
Bug in audit log MySQL file resolved.
Significant fix made in variable formula evaluation for optimization.

cards.title: Fixes
points: Fixed issues in Rest API proxy.

cards.title: Added
points: New feature to handle Azure storage customizations.
Support for InfluxDB versions 2 and 3.
New feature allows the use of RESTful APIs as variables.
Additional functionality for bulk actions on on-premises systems.
Logging events for the next sprint.
Improved automation modal UI and optimized multistep code.
Enhancement to the Secret Manager integration.

cards.title: Enhancements
points: Optimization for the database connector to enhance performance.

cards.title: Fixes
points: Various minor issues, including a bug affecting routing features.
Fix for a bug related to loader screen removal.
Fixes for a bug in the runapi test category.
Bug affecting the color picker control in the preview.

cards.title: Enhancements
points: Machine identification for Kubernetes moved to the database for better management.

cards.title: Fixes
points: Several fixes made to the multipart API connector.
Data type inconsistencies in the web application resolved.

cards.title: Enhancements
points: Change made to the process of renaming subcategories for better organization.

cards.title: Fixes
points: Fixes applied to table grid functionality, including a resolution for a bug affecting the refresh data function.
Various improvements and fixes made to the import process.

cards.title: Enhancements
points: Unnecessary logs removed to streamline performance.

cards.title: Fixes
points: Display of the Secret Manager addon updated for better clarity.
Fix applied to address a missing parameter issue in the runapi function related to refreshing flows.

cards.title: Enhancements
points: New version of the Secret Manager introduced with additional features.

cards.title: Fixes
points: Bug affecting multistep processes resolved.
Updates from the runapi cloud incorporated.
Issue related to file names in bulk actions fixed.
Import issues related to variable subcategory creation addressed for smoother operation.

cards.title: Added
points: SSH tunneling and import from AWS UI adapted to JS Editor.
Feature: Connector-health-check.
Added Ask AI for code level syntax errors.

cards.title: Enhancements
points: Updated connector-health-check.

cards.title: Fixes
points: Fixed autoFillConnectorInfo.
Fixed app publish in beta version.
Bug fix for shifting.
Secret manager and other updates from prod.
Fixed Widget delete and rules.

cards.title: Added
points: AWS services IAM role-based access added.

cards.title: Fixes
points: Fixed branding default logo.
Fixed db connector port undefined issue.
Fixed SSH key generation.
Handled undefined response for connector.
Handled subCatDetails variable undefined case in ConnectorLib.
Bug Fix for undefined in master control header mapping.
